LanguageData.CoproliteRocks.label: coprolite rocks
LanguageData.CoproliteRocks.description: A snack from a vending machine. Delicious chocolate balls with a crunchy hazelnut center.
LanguageData.LavaFlow.label: lava flow
LanguageData.LavaFlow.description: A drink from a vending machine. A thick, fruity smoothie made from red fruits and vegetables. Yummy!
LanguageData.Paleobar.label: paleobar
LanguageData.Paleobar.description: A snack from a vending machine. A healthy snack compressed into a small, energy-rich bar, made out of oats, nuts and... grass?
LanguageData.SornaPunch.label: sorna punch
LanguageData.SornaPunch.description: A drink from a vending machine. A tropical, sugary drink that makes you tingle all over. Fizzy!
